# Biscuits

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
recipes <- read_excel("recipes.xlsx")
```

## `r recipes |> pull(name)`


:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}

```{r}
plain_list <- function(...) {
  cat(paste0(c(...), collapse = "\n"))
  cat("\n")
}

plain_list(recipes |> 
              pull(ingredients)|>
              str_split("; ") |> 
              unlist()
           )
```


```{r}
bullet_list <- function(...) {
  cat(paste0("- ", c(...), collapse = "\n"))
  cat("\n")
}

bullet_list(recipes |> 
              pull(method)|>
              str_split("; ") |> 
              unlist()
           )
```
